movies.title: Bay Rong
movies.cast: Ngo Thanh Van, Johny Tri Nguyen
movies.description: Trinh, a mercenary, must complete a series of organized crime jobs for her boss in order to win the release of her kidnapped daughter...

movies.title: Cuoi Ngay Keo Lo
movies.cast: Ngoc Diep, Thai Hoa, Johny Tri Nguyen
movies.description: Khanh Linh, a fashion magazine editor, is on the verge of losing her job if her next project is not a hit. She finds herself having to work with Son, a successful photographer who she injured in a car accident.
